author: Ubisoft
description:
The Rogue Prince of Persia is out now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC!
Check out the behind-the-scenes video to learn why the Prince isn’t purple anymore, and how Early Access players helped shape the game into what it is today.

Rewrite fate, save Persia… or die trying.
Play now 👉 https://store.ubisoft.com/6635164075637a09298a6001.html

Again: a huge thanks to everyone who joined us during Early Access and helped shape the game! ⚔️ 

 INSTAGRAM: princeofpersia_game
 FACEBOOK: Prince Of Persia
X: @princeofpersia
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/PrinceofPersia

Coming later this year to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2!

The Rogue Prince of Persia is a challenging, fast-paced roguelite, where every death is a unique chance to rewrite fate, save Persia – or die trying. Explore and platform in a shifting kingdom imagined by Evil Empire, master an acrobatic combat style, and meet new allies as you fight to rewrite the fate of your people. 

Available now
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia - 1 year of Early Access
